data.name: GGST Additional Battle Stage 1 - Lap of the Kami
data.detailed_description:
The additional battle stage "Lap of the Kami" becomes selectable in-game.

*The main game (sold separately) is required to use this item.
Please update the game with the latest patch to use this item.
data.about_the_game:
The additional battle stage "Lap of the Kami" becomes selectable in-game.

*The main game (sold separately) is required to use this item.
Please update the game with the latest patch to use this item.
data.short_description: Adds a new battle stage, "Lap of the Kami".
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3450, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
